articles.description: In the last 3 hours, two M-class solar flares erupted on the Sun sparking radio blackouts on Earth. Is this a sign of an incoming solar storm?
articles.content: More solar activity has been detected on the Sun, and it could spell bad news for the Earth. Currently, there is a coronal mass ejection (CME) that is traveling towards us and is likely to strike the… [+2108 chars]
